timeline.message:
Provide warning for unsupported rest-client features in native

This doesn't fix anything, but does at the least warn users building
a native binary that rest-client with @ClientHeaderParam
and default methods may not work.

Relates to #10249

Co-authored-by: Guillaume Smet <guillaume.smet@gmail.com>
